statements: DELETE FROM football_injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Fracture' AND recovery_time > 30;
DELETE FROM football_injuries WHERE player_id = 101 AND injury_type = 'ankle sprain';
DELETE FROM football_injuries WHERE recovery_time > 30 AND fitness_level = 'poor';
DELETE FROM football_injuries WHERE player_id = 123 AND injury_type = 'Sprain'
DELETE FROM MedicalEvaluations WHERE player_id = 10 AND evaluation_result = 'Fit';
DELETE FROM FootballInjuries WHERE player_id = 101 AND injury_type = 'Knee Injury';
DELETE FROM MedicalEvaluations WHERE NOT evaluation_result = 'Fit' AND player_id = 202 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM evaluations WHERE player_id = 2 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Medical_Evaluations WHERE player_id = 456 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
